content:
Yes, here are some accessible apps and programs for individuals with cognitive disabilities:

1. My Talking Angela
2. Lumosity 
3. Speech Therapy: Articulation
4. Autism Therapy with MITA
5. BrainPOP Jr. 
6. Peek-a-Zoo
7. Sensory Baby Toddler Learning
8. Autism Tracker Lite: Track, Analyze and Share ASD Progress
9. Special Words 
10. PicCollage Kids - Pic Editor & Photo Collage Maker

Note: It's important to remember that individuals with cognitive disabilities have a wide range of needs and abilities, so it's important to do thorough research and consult with professionals before choosing any app or program for them.
